gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 121, Pistons 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite 50 points on 18-25 FGs from Detroit’s Malachi Flynn, the Hawks hold on to defeat the Pistons 121-113. Jalen Johnson totaled his first career triple-double with 28 points, 14 rebounds, and a career-high 11 assists as De’Andre Hunter (26 points, seven rebounds) and Dejounte Murray (24 points, 11 assists) added 50 points for Atlanta. The Hawks improve to 36-40 as the Pistons fall to 13-63. The Hawks are now tied with the Bulls record-wise.
